channel.title: Siamese Neural Networks on Tafreed Ahmad
channel.description: Recent content in Siamese Neural Networks on Tafreed Ahmad

item.title: Influencing Factors in Facial Recognition and Verification: A Siamese Neural Network Hyperparameter Study
item.description: This study explores optimizing hyperparameters for Siamese neural networks to improve facial recognition performance, focusing on optimizers, loss functions, and data preprocessing techniques.
